name: destiny-bond
flavor_text: After using this move, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
effect_text_extend:
If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint.  End-of-turn damage is ignored.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect_text_simple: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.
